item.title: 特朗普与习近平在韩国会谈的关键问题
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周四将在韩国会见中国国家主席习近平，这是他第二个任期内面临的最严峻挑战之一，世界上最大的两个经济体将寻求避免贸易战升级。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump faces one of the toughest challenges of his second term when he meets Chinese President Xi Jinping in South Korea on Thursday, where the world's two largest economies will seek to avert an escalation of their trade war.】

item.title: 巴西总统卢拉称特朗普 "保证 "与美国达成贸易协议
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）周一表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普在两国领导人最近的会晤中 "保证 "两国将达成贸易协议。【原文：Brazil's President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva said on Monday that U.S. President Donald Trump had "guaranteed" that the two countries would reach a deal on trade during a recent meeting between the two leaders.】

item.title: 特朗普在习近平峰会前赴东京举行贸易和安全会谈
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周一启程前往东京，他计划在那里会见日本天皇和新当选的首相佐那江隆一，这是旨在确保贸易协议、投资和增加国防开支的亚洲之行的一部分。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump departed for Tokyo on Monday, where he was scheduled to meet Japan's emperor and newly elected Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi as part of an Asia trip aimed at securing trade deals, investment and increased defence spending.】

item.title: 机器狗和人工智能无人机群：中国如何将 DeepSeek 用于战争时代
item.description: 路透社对数以百计的研究论文、专利和采购记录进行了审查，为中国政府利用人工智能获取军事优势的系统性努力提供了一个缩影。【原文：A Reuters review of hundreds of research papers, patents and procurement records gives a snapshot of the systematic effort by Beijing to harness AI for military advantage.】

item.title: 美联储会议召开前，股市因贸易协议乐观情绪而飙升，美元则随波逐流
item.description: 周一，随着中美贸易紧张局势缓和的迹象提振了风险偏好，亚洲股市大涨，美元走势徘徊，为本周的央行会议和巨头财报开了个好头。【原文：Asian stocks surged and the dollar meandered on Monday as signs of easing trade tensions between China and the U.S. buoyed risk appetite, in a strong start to a week that will be headlined by central bank meetings and megacap earnings.】

item.title: 全球首个与日元挂钩的稳定币在日本首次亮相
item.description: 世界上首个与日元挂钩的稳定币将于周一在日本推出，这在一个现金和信用卡等传统支付手段占据金融基础设施主导地位的国家是一个微小但意义重大的举措。【原文：The world's first stablecoin pegged to the yen will be launched in Japan on Monday, a small but significant move in a country where traditional payment means like cash and credit cards dominate financial infrastructure.】

item.title: 贸易谈判和美联储会议迫在眉睫，美元兑日元创两周新高
item.description: 周一，在全球贸易谈判和央行会议密集的一周开始之际，美元兑日元汇率升至两周多来的新高。【原文：The U.S. dollar rose to a more than two-week high against the yen on Monday at the start of a packed week of global trade negotiations and central bank meetings.】

item.title: 中美达成贸易协议框架后油价上涨
item.description: 在中美两国经济官员勾勒出贸易协议框架后，油价在周一早盘上涨，缓解了人们对全球前两大石油消费国之间的关税和出口限制可能影响全球经济增长的担忧。【原文：Oil prices rose in early trade on Monday after U.S. and Chinese economic officials sketched out a trade-deal framework, easing fears that tariffs and export curbs between the world's top two oil consumers could dent global economic growth.】

item.title: 日本 9 月服务业通胀领先指标回升
item.description: 周一的数据显示，9月份日本服务业通胀的领先指标连续第二个月回升，支持了日本央行的观点，即劳动力成本上升将有助于把通胀率持续维持在2%的目标附近。【原文：A leading indicator of Japan's service-sector inflation perked up for the second straight month in September, data showed on Monday, backing up the central bank's view that rising labour costs will help keep inflation sustainably around its 2% target.】

item.title: 卢森堡法院就麦道夫案作出裁决后，汇丰银行将计提 11 亿美元拨备
item.description: 汇丰控股周一表示，在卢森堡法院就与麦道夫投资欺诈案有关的长期诉讼作出裁决后，该公司将在第三季度业绩中确认 11 亿美元的拨备。【原文：HSBC Holdings said on Monday it will recognise a provision of $1.1 billion in its third-quarter results after a Luxembourg court ruling in a long-running lawsuit tied to the Bernard Madoff investment fraud.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 Larvotto 资源公司因估值问题拒绝 3.73 亿美元收购要约
item.description: 澳大利亚 Larvotto 资源公司周一表示，该公司拒绝了上周从美国锑业公司（United States Antimony Corporation）收到的不具约束力的指示性报价，该报价对该矿商的估值约为 7.229 亿澳元（4.6974 亿美元）。【原文：Australia's Larvotto Resources said on Monday it had rejected a non-binding indicative offer received last week from United States Antimony Corporation, valuing the miner at about A$722.9 million ($469.74 million).】

item.title: 澳大利亚将微软告上法庭，称其误导了 270 万客户
item.description: 澳大利亚竞争监督机构周一表示，已向联邦法院提起诉讼，指控微软澳大利亚公司及其母公司微软公司涉嫌误导约 270 万澳大利亚客户。【原文：Australia's competition watchdog said on Monday said it has filed proceedings in the Federal Court against Microsoft Australia and its parent company Microsoft Corp for allegedly misleading about 2.7 million Australian customers.】

item.title: 美国运输部长称出现空中交通管制员短缺问题
item.description: 美国交通部长肖恩-达菲（Sean Duffy）表示，美国机场周六报告了 20 多起空中交通管制员短缺事件，这是政府停摆影响的最新迹象。【原文：U.S. airports reported more than 20 incidents of air traffic controller shortages on Saturday, Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy said, in the latest sign of the government shutdown's impact.】

item.title: 诺华将以约 120 亿美元收购 Avidity 生物科学公司
item.description: 瑞士制药商诺华（Novartis）周日表示，同意以约 120 亿美元的现金收购美国生物技术公司 Avidity Biosciences。【原文：Swiss drugmaker Novartis on Sunday said it agreed to acquire U.S. biotech firm Avidity Biosciences for about $12 billion in cash, as the company looks to bolster its portfolio of treatments for rare muscle disorders.】

item.title: IAM 在罢工近三个月后拒绝了波音公司的最新报价
item.description: 国际机械师和航空航天工人协会工会周日表示，该工会投票拒绝了波音公司的最新合同提议，称波音公司未能解决其技术娴熟、兢兢业业的员工队伍的核心优先事项。【原文：The International Association of Machinists and Aerospace Workers union said on Sunday it voted to reject Boeing’s latest contract offer, saying the company had failed to address the core priorities of its skilled and dedicated workforce.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，诺华接近达成以每股超过 70 美元的价格收购 Avidity Biosciences 的交易
item.description: 彭博新闻社援引一位熟悉内情的人士的话报道，诺华公司即将以每股超过 70 美元的价格收购美国生物技术公司 Avidity Biosciences。【原文：Novartis AG is close to acquiring U.S. biotech Avidity Biosciences for more than $70 per share, Bloomberg News reported, citing a person familiar with the matter who said an announcement could come as early as Sunday.】

item.title: 普京投资特使德米特里耶夫继续与美国官员会谈
item.description: 俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京的投资与经济合作特使基里尔-德米特里耶夫（Kirill Dmitriev）周日表示，他与唐纳德-特朗普总统的美国政府代表继续进行了会谈。【原文：Russian President Vladimir Putin's special envoy for investment and economic cooperation, Kirill Dmitriev, said on Sunday that he had continued talks with representatives of President Donald Trump's administration in the United States.】

item.title: 贝森特：中国将推迟稀土规定并购买美国大豆
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周日表示，他预计中国将在数年内恢复对美国大豆的大量采购，并将把扩大稀土许可制度的时间推迟一年，并在马来西亚举行的为期两天的贸易谈判后重新审查该制度。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said on Sunday that he anticipates that China will revive substantial purchases of U.S. soybeans for several years and will delay its expanded licensing regime for rare earths by a year and re-examine it after two days of trade talks in Malaysia.】

item.title: HD 现代重工与亨廷顿-英格尔斯公司将联合建造美国海军辅助舰艇
item.description: 韩国现代重工（HD Hyundai Heavy Industries）和美国亨廷顿-英格尔斯（Huntington Ingalls）军用造船厂周日表示，双方已同意联合建造美国海军辅助舰艇。【原文：South Korea's HD Hyundai Heavy Industries and U.S. military shipbuilder Huntington Ingalls have agreed to jointly build U.S. navy auxiliary ships, the South Korean shipbuilder said on Sunday.】

item.title: 大众汽车首席执行官告诉《图片报》，大众暂时没有芯片供应问题
item.description: 在中国颁布出口禁令后，欧洲汽车制造商正在寻找货源。【原文：European carmakers are searching for supplies after a Chinese export ban.】

item.title: 泰国与美国达成贸易框架协议
item.description: 美国和泰国周日宣布了一项互惠贸易框架，美国将继续对泰国产品征收 19% 的关税，同时确定有可能将关税调整或削减至零的产品。【原文：The United States and Thailand on Sunday announced a framework for reciprocal trade that would see the U.S. maintain a 19% tariff on Thai products while identifying products where tariffs could potentially be adjusted or cut to zero.】

item.title: 贝森特称中美就稀土和特朗普的关税威胁达成框架协议 -NBC 采访
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周日表示，他已与中国副总理何立峰达成了一个 "非常实质性的框架"，将避免美国对中国商品征收100%的关税，并实现推迟中国稀土出口管制的目标。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said on Sunday he has reached a "very substantial framework" with Chinese Vice Premier He Lifeng that will avoid 100% U.S. tariffs on Chinese goods and achieve a deferral of China's rare earths export controls.】

item.title: 美国政府关门威胁国会支出权
item.description: 随着共和党和民主党议员就美国政府停摆的责任进行交锋，一些人开始担心，僵局正在将他们在联邦开支方面的权力让给日益强硬的唐纳德-特朗普总统。【原文：As Republican and Democratic lawmakers trade blame for the U.S. government shutdown, some have begun to worry that the impasse is ceding their authority over federal spending to an increasingly assertive President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 美国航空公司在加沙停火之际恢复飞往以色列的航班
item.description: 美国航空公司周日表示，将于三月份恢复飞往以色列的航班。此前，哈马斯于 2023 年 10 月 7 日发动袭击，引发了长达两年的加沙战争，美国航空公司因此停止了纽约肯尼迪机场至特拉维夫的航线。【原文：American Airlines said on Sunday it would resume flights to Israel in March, after the U.S. carrier halted the New York JFK to Tel Aviv route following Hamas' October 7, 2023 attack that triggered the two-year war in Gaza.】

item.title: 美越同意促进贸易，部分越南商品关税或将取消
item.description: 美国白宫周日表示，美国和越南将在未来几周内敲定一项贸易协定，该协定将维持对大多数越南商品征收 20% 的关税，但将取消某些产品的关税，这将在稍后阶段决定。【原文：The United States and Vietnam will finalise a trade agreement in the coming weeks that will maintain 20% tariffs on most Vietnamese goods but lift duties on certain products that will be decided at a later stage, the White House said on Sunday.】

item.title: 特朗普与东南亚伙伴就贸易和重要矿产签署协议
item.description: 在中国对稀土实施更严格的出口限制后，华盛顿正寻求解决贸易失衡问题并实现供应链多样化。【原文：Washington is looking to address trade imbalances and diversify supply chains after China imposed tighter export curbs on rare earths.】

item.title: 中美在马来西亚举行会谈后，特朗普对达成协议充满信心
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普和习近平预计将于下周会晤。【原文：Donald Trump and Xi Jinping are expected to meet next week.】

item.title: 软银批准 OpenAI 剩余的 225 亿美元投资，The Information 报道
item.description: 据科技新闻网站 The Information 周六报道，软银已批准第二笔 225 亿美元的投资，以完成对 OpenAI 的 300 亿美元投资。【原文：SoftBank has approved a second installment of $22.5 billion to complete its $30 billion investment in OpenAI, tech news website the Information reported on Saturday.】

item.title: 世界大赛期间播出广告后，特朗普决定对加拿大加征 10%的关税
item.description: 特朗普在宣布提高关税时提到了一则以已故总统罗纳德-里根为主角的广告。【原文：Trump announced the higher tariffs referencing an ad featuring late President Ronald Reagan.】

item.title: 埃克森公司就气候披露法起诉加州
item.description: 埃克森美孚周五起诉加利福尼亚州，对该州要求大公司公开披露温室气体排放和气候相关财务风险的两项法律提出质疑。【原文：Exxon Mobil sued California on Friday, challenging two state laws that require large companies to publicly disclose their greenhouse gas emissions and climate-related financial risks.】
